article_title: To Save for a House,a Teacher Takes one Two Jobs
article_text:
What do you do when your dream job doesn’t quite pay the bills?

For Dean Simmer of Detroit, the answer involves modest spending, careful planning and a lot of coffee.

For the past five years, Mr. Simmer has run the technology department of a...

twitter.description: A high-school teacher takes a second job to be able to afford a house. But that’s not all he’ll have to do, according to a financial adviser.
twitter.creator: @AdamJanofsky
